mapper.select: select distinct o.id, o.uid , o.sid, o.addr, o.addrd, o.phon, o.nick, o.date,o.status, o.ask, d.odid , ( select sum( num * price ) from detail group by odid having odid = o.id) + ( select IFNULL( sum(oprice), 0 ) from dopt dt left join detail d on d.id = dt.did where d.odid = o.id ) as allprice from orders o left join detail d on o.id = d.odid left join dopt dt on d.id = dt.did where o.sid = #{sid} order by o.id desc;

select o.id, o.uid, o.sid, o.addr, o.addrd, o.phon, o.nick, o.date, o.status, o.ask , d.id as detail_id, d.odid as detail_odid, d.mnid as detail_mnid, d.mname as detail_mname, d.num as detail_num, d.price as detail_price , dt.did as dopt_did, dt.opid as dopt_opid, dt.oname as dopt_oname, dt.oprice as dopt_oprice from orders o left join detail d on o.id = d.odid left join dopt dt on d.id = dt.did where d.odid = #{id} order by d.id asc;

select o.id, o.uid, o.sid, o.addr, o.addrd, o.phon, o.nick, o.date, o.status, o.ask, s.name as shop_name from orders o left join shop s on o.sid = s.id where mid = #{shop_mid} order by o.status desc, o.id asc
mapper.update: update orders set status=#{status} where id=#{id};
